overview: Posh Kitten plays tribute to the days of pin-ups and high-heeled honeys. The A-list cast pours sexuality across the screen with smoldering glances and steamy seductions resulting in mind blowing, screaming orgasms. With boy / girl, girl / girl, solo and anal scenes throughout, this dialogue free production is helmed by the newly acclaimed and highly regarded Celeste. Don't miss it.
tagline: High-heeled honeys and babes on the loose!
title: Posh Kitten
